member.name: T:Preparation.API.Controllers.AnnouncementsController
member.summary: Provides endpoints for Announcements management

member.name: M:Preparation.API.Controllers.AnnouncementsController.#ctor(Preparation.API.Data.Repository.IAnnouncementRepository,AutoMapper.IMapper)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the AnnouncementsController class
member.param: An instance of IAnnouncementRepository to handle the Announcements
An instance of IMapper to map between Announcement entities and models

member.name: M:Preparation.API.Controllers.AnnouncementsController.GetAnnouncements
member.summary: Gets a list of Announcements.
member.returns: A list of AnnouncementGetResponseModel, or No Content if there are no announcements.

member.name: M:Preparation.API.Controllers.AnnouncementsController.GetAnnouncement(System.Guid)
member.summary: Gets the Announcement with the specified ID.
member.param: The ID of the Announcement to retrieve.
member.returns: An AnnouncementGetResponseModel representing the retrieved Announcement, or NotFound if the Announcement does not exist.

member.name: M:Preparation.API.Controllers.AnnouncementsController.PatchAnnouncement(System.Guid,Preparation.API.Models.AnnouncementPatchRequestModel)
member.summary: Updates the Announcement with the specified ID.
member.param: The ID of the Announcement to update.
An AnnouncementPatchRequestModel containing the properties to update.
member.returns: An AnnouncementPatchResponseModel representing the updated Announcement, or BadRequest if the update failed or the Announcement does not exist.

member.name: M:Preparation.API.Controllers.AnnouncementsController.PostAnnouncement(Preparation.API.Models.AnnouncementPostRequestModel)
member.summary: Creates a new Announcement.
member.param: An AnnouncementPostRequestModel containing the properties of the Announcement to create.
member.returns: A CreatedAtActionResult containing a URL to the new Announcement and the AnnouncementPostResponseModel of the created Announcement, or BadRequest if the creation failed.

member.name: M:Preparation.API.Controllers.AnnouncementsController.DeleteAnnouncement(System.Guid)
member.summary: Deletes an announcement with the given ID.
member.param: The ID of the announcement to delete.

item.description: HTTP 204 No Content if the announcement was successfully deleted.
HTTP 404 Not Found if an announcement with the given ID could not be found.

member.name: M:Preparation.API.Controllers.DocumentsController.GetDocuments
member.summary: Returns a list of documents.

member.name: M:Preparation.API.Controllers.DocumentsController.GetDocument(System.Guid)
member.summary: Returns the document with the specified id.
member.param: The id of the document.
member.returns: The DocumentGetResponseModel with the specified id, or NotFound if the document is not found.

member.name: M:Preparation.API.Controllers.DocumentsController.PatchDocument(System.Guid,Preparation.API.Models.DocumentPatchRequestModel)
member.summary: Updates the document with the specified id.
member.param: The id of the document to update.
The DocumentPatchRequestModel with the updated values.
member.returns: The DocumentPatchResponseModel with the updated values, or NotFound if the document is not found.

member.name: M:Preparation.API.Controllers.DocumentsController.PostDocument(Preparation.API.Models.DocumentPostRequestModel)
member.summary: Creates a new document.
member.param: The DocumentPostRequestModel with the values for the new document.
member.returns: The DocumentPostResponseModel for the newly created document.

member.name: M:Preparation.API.Controllers.DocumentsController.DeleteDocument(System.Guid)
member.summary: Deletes a Document by ID
member.param: The ID of the Document to delete
member.returns: NoContent if the Document is successfully deleted, NotFound if the Document is not found
